TopicTitle: Incorrect "Vessel destroyed" messages in Flight Report when using decouplers

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce TX 2060 SUPER | RAM: 32 GB

 

Every time a decoupler is used in flight appears to be logged in Flight Report as the Vessel being destroyed.

See attached screenshot. Note that the rocket i used had 4 radial and 2 inline decouplers, all of which generated a "Vessel destroyed" message upon activation.

I could reproduce the same bug using at least 3 different craft files.
